room_title: Escape room "Pirates: Captured!" by Captured in Coventry in Trappe
room_description: You and your friends have discovered an ancient treasure map buried in the floor boards of your great grandfathers house. You decide to rent a charter boat and set sail to find the treasure when you are captured by a group of pirates. They steal your map and throw you into the ships prison hold. You have only 1 hour to find your map and escape before the pirates return and decide your fate!
